name: MonoGameJam!
description:
!!! THE DOWNLOAD IS CURRENTLY LOCKED !!!

MonoGameJam! is my entry for the Jam of the same name.

Description:

It's a puzzle-action game where you control a rabbit and have to convert all the colored tiles of the level before timer ends to go to the next level. 

You can do so by switching your own color and walk on tiles, plus you'll have to deal with creeps too; pass safely through creeps with the same color as you, or even better, jump on them to kill them, but don't walk on tiles or creeps if they're not of the same color!

TIPS: When you're in air, you're INVINCIBLE to EVERY CREEPS, plus you can bump & KILL CREEPS of the same color than you! Make life a lot more easier!

Controls:

On Xbox gamepads, use leftstick or d-pad to move and 4 colored buttons to switch your own color by jumping, start to go to next screen, and back to EXIT the game.

Use the ARROWS on keyboard, and X/C/V/B to switch your color, SPACE/ENTER to go to next screen and ESCAPE to EXIT the game.
